pgrid.core.storage
Class DBView

java.lang.Object
  pgrid.core.storage.DBView

public class DBView
extends Object

Title: DBView

Description: A utility class to generate a "View" of the tables, i.e. generate SQL queries and subqueries

Version:
1.0
Author:
Mark Kornfilt

Constructor Summary

          Constructs a DBView based on an SQL statement.
